Affliction.name: Resurrection Inhibited
Affliction.description: The subject's ability to resurrect has been temporarily halted.

Affliction.name: Abyssal Mark
Affliction.description: For a brief time, you may defy death.

Affliction.name: Mycor Infection
Affliction.description: A temporary fungal infection has taken root in your body. Antibiotics should flush it out.

Affliction.name: Abyssal Contamination Precursor
Affliction.description: An affliction for handling the infection.

Affliction.name: Abyssal Decay
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to the abyssal rot.
